option-set.name: fullWidthBackground
option-set.label: Full width layout?
option-set.help-text: Makes the background of the layout fill the entire screen, making it great for coloring the background to emphasising its contents.

input.name: backgroundColor
input.label: Background color?
input.help-text: Use hexadecimal color codes ('#dd0044'), or write the name of the color in English ('purple').

input.name: layoutConf
input.label: Column configuration
input.help-text: The numbers represent the amount of percent each column should occupy of the screen (responsive).
